resources.string:
In this section, select/write all the necessary information that applies to you. 

If any of the questions deems irrelevant to you, please provide a feedback from the options available at the bottom of the screen! 

Swipe right to get started!

In this section, describe the situation you faced. 

Please try to limit yourself to 5 sentences and describe the entire situation in the clearest possible terms. 

Should you need any assistance, please follow the prompts on each of the text area to help you describe better. 

Swipe right and tell us!

In this section, highlight the concern you have with the described situation. 

Please try to limit yourself to 5 sentences and bring out the major concern you have with the inter-cultural interaction. 

Should you need any assistance, please follow the prompt on the text area and start describing the concern. 

Swipe right, we're listening!
In the most neutral terms, describe the situation you faced. It is recommended that you include the W"s (Who, When, What) and How in your description. Try to limit the description to 5 sentences.

Beyond Words is an interactive survey application designed to collect data from the user"s regarding various intercultural situations. The application aims to use the data to come up with solutions to avoid intercultural situations between people of different nationalities, cultures, or languages. 
 
The application is free to download and use. Please note that the application does not store the user's personal information and does not share it with any third party. Beyond Words will use only the user's input on the intercultural situations only for analysis purposes. 
 
By accessing the application, you accept the above-mentioned terms and conditions.
What are your concerns about this interaction? What questions does it raise? Or What you have learned from this situation
